name: Appwidget-listview
tagline: A simple appwidget having ListView as its view. All the codes reflect way to populate ListView from remote data. Further detail tutorial of it can be found on  http://laaptu.wordpress.com/2013/07/19/android-app-widget-with-listview/
body:
A simple appwidget with ListView
Works from Honeycomb onwards
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
